name: Dotfiles
body:
# Vim configuration files and plugins
  * ***Run shell script with*** ```./makesymlinks.sh``` **Then:**
  * ```cd ~/vimdots```
  * ```git submodule init```
  * ```git submodule update```

### Disclaimer: This is **not** my capybara, nor did I shoot this video. I just thought it was cool.

![someoneelsescapybara](http://gifsoup.com/webroot/animatedgifs/1058778_o.gif)
